title: Bad
review:
Do you know why this is the worst sequel ever (aside from the crappy sequels from Disney)?
Not only it is too over-long and boring it also makes it beautiful prequel become less attractive to the viewers. That is criminal. Sure, the keywords on IMDB point out the chicks are pretty but that is not enough justification for more sequels or remakes.Hollywood, not every film needs a sequel. STOP.
